# scroll(to:)

**Instance Method**

Changes the origin of the receiver to the specified point.

## Declaration

```swift
func scroll(to p: CGPoint)
```

## Parameters

- **p**: The new origin.

## Scrolling the layer

- **scroll(to:)**: Scroll the contents of the receiver to ensure that the rectangle is visible.
